meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sally Sheinberg Kay Thanaporn Christi Esterle Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6875.

td.p: Sally Sheinberg, a substitute teacher from Palmdale, California
Kay Thanaporn, a health care consultant from Decatur, Georgia
Christi Esterle, a librarian and stay-at-home mom from Colorado Springs, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,199)

tr.td: ON THE "LEFT"
COOL IDEA
BESTSELLING AUTHORS BY PARTIAL TITLE
NATIONAL ANIMALS
OLDIES
NEWBIES
